message_1: What products will be formed when calcium carbonate (CaCO3) decomposes upon heating? Write the balanced chemical equation for the reaction also.
message_2:
When calcium carbonate (CaCO3) decomposes upon heating, it forms calcium oxide (CaO) and carbon dioxide (CO2) as products. The balanced chemical equation for this reaction is:
